data.name: Endzone - A World Apart: Halloween
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to post-apocalyptic Halloween, Survivors!

With this free DLC for Endzone - A World Apart your settlement can be adorned with 14 all-new - mostly Halloween themed - decorations that perfectly fit the setting. Also, your settlers - including yourself - probably don't want to miss worshiping the Great Old One, or else...

Important Information:
This DLC is available indefinitely, not just during Halloween Season! So if you forgot to check in during Halloween, don’t worry! The content will still be there to enjoy.

Additionally, the new decorative items don’t just look spookily great, but are also tied to Endzone’s game mechanics for decorative items and increase your settlement’s attractiveness (looks like your settlers really like eerie stuff, huh…)

If you are not a fan of Halloween, all DLC content can also be disabled manually by deselecting the DLC in your Steam options.

data.supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Korean, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: I5-2500K, 4-Cores @3.30 GHz or equivalent AMD-Hardware
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
